Welcome to geometric-smote documentation!¶

Getting Started¶

Information to install, test, and contribute to the package.

Documentation¶

The main documentation. This contains an in-depth description of Geometric SMOTE algorithm and how to apply it. It also contains the exact API of all functions and classes, as given in the docstring.

Examples¶

A set of examples illustrating the use of the G-SMOTE algorithm. It complements the User Guide.

Additional Information¶

Release history and about section of geometric-smote.

See the README for more information.
